short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automagically link require('module') to npmjs.com & nodejs.org/api

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It helps when you browse some javascript on github and want to jump directly to npm.

require-link ignores local requires (require('./some-path'))

If you'd like that, please star repo at https://github.com/marinintim/require-link
